lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Baker also said that after meeting Japanese special envy Shintaro Abe, "it's clear that Japan intends to take strong steps to stimulate its economy to meet its committments under the Louvre Accord."

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Baker stressed adminstration trade policy sought to remove foreign barriers to trade and via forthcoming GATT talks will focus on agriculture, services and intellectual property.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: In a speech largely devoted to discussing trade and competitiveness, Baker again warned of the dangers of protectionist trade legislation, saying it would harm the U.
